--- title: "`htmltools`: Play with Tachyons" date: "2025-03-13" filters: - tachyons format: html: page-layout: full code-tools: false comments: false toc-depth: 3 --- ## Relevant Resources - Official documentation: [Tachyons' component](https://tachyons.io/components/) ## Translate Tachyon to R ### Example 1: [Large Paragraph](https://tachyons.io/components/text/large-paragraph/index.html) With multiple classes, `class` argument in tags can be a vector. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(htmltools) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} text_paragraph <- "Typography has one plain duty before it and that is to convey information in writing. No argument or consideration can absolve typography from this duty. A printed work which cannot be read becomes a product without purpose." large_paragraph <- withTags( text_paragraph |> p(class = c("f4", "lh-copy measure")) |> main(class = c("pa3", "pa5-ns")) ) large_paragraph ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Typography has one plain duty before it and that is to convey information in writing. No argument or consideration can absolve typography from this duty. A printed work which cannot be read becomes a product without purpose.

No argument or considerat"| __truncated__ .. ..- attr(*, "class")= chr "shiny.tag" - attr(*, "class")= chr "shiny.tag" ``` ::: ::: ### Example 2: Title and Subtitle ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} withTags( header( h1("This is the title", class = c("f3", "f2-m", "f1-l", "fw2", "black-90", "mv3")), h2("This is the subtitle where additional information can go", class = c("f5", "f4-m", "f3-l", "fw2", "black-50", "mt0", "lh-copy")) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

This is the title

This is the subtitle where additional information can go

``` ::: ::: ### Example 3: [Logo Title](https://tachyons.io/components/nav/logo-titles-links-centered/index.html) ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} title = "Jihong Zhang" subtitle = "Play Harder, Learn Harder" header_class <- "bg-white black-80 tc pv4 avenir" a_class <- "bg-black-80 ba b--black dib pa3 w2 h2 br-100" h1_class <- "mt2 mb0 baskerville i fw1 f1" h2_class <- "mt2 mb0 f6 fw4 ttu tracked" svg_one_dot <- a(tags$svg(class = "white", `data-icon`="skull", viewBox="0 0 32 32", style="fill:currentcolor"), class = a_class) tags$header(class = header_class) |> tagAppendChild(svg_one_dot) |> tagAppendChild(h1(title, class = h1_class)) |> tagAppendChild(h2(subtitle, class= h2_class)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Jihong Zhang

Play Harder, Learn Harder
